enchantment.cenchants.dueling.desc: Hitting an enemy will knock away other nearby foes
enchantment.cenchants.rampage.desc: Slaying enemies bestows buffs upon you
enchantment.cenchants.triumph.desc: Slaying enemies replenishes health and hunger
enchantment.cenchants.lethality.desc: Increased damage to foes with heavier armor
enchantment.cenchants.inferno.desc: Hitting an enemy ignites all nearby foes
enchantment.cenchants.sorcery.desc: Taking damage will randomly bestow buffs
enchantment.cenchants.zap.desc: Hitting a target launches bouncing lightning
enchantment.cenchants.volley.desc: Hitting a target summons a volley of arrows above them
enchantment.cenchants.hunter.desc: Mark your enemies, and gain movement buffs for hitting them
enchantment.cenchants.tranquilize.desc: Your enemies will drift off to sleep after a short delay
enchantment.cenchants.frost.desc: Deeply chill enemies, slowing and damaging them
enchantment.cenchants.shielding.desc: Gain absorption when out of combat
enchantment.cenchants.flame_walker.desc: Leave a trail of flame after taking damage
enchantment.cenchants.explode.desc: Fatally explode by hitting an enemy
enchantment.cenchants.darkness.desc: Gain buffs in the shadows, but burn in the light
enchantment.cenchants.bite.desc: Spawn angry wolves around your target
enchantment.cenchants.combo.desc: Hitting an enemy repeatedly will strike them with lightning
enchantment.cenchants.barrage.desc: Repeated strikes allow you to launch arrows instantly
enchantment.cenchants.lightweight.desc: Equip and block with greater speed
enchantment.cenchants.snap.desc: Summon a line of fangs after hitting an enemy
enchantment.cenchants.inking.desc: Gain a chance to blind enemies
enchantment.cenchants.tremor.desc: Falling from great heights will damage surrounding enemies
enchantment.cenchants.aftershock.desc: Inflict additional damage after you finish attacking
